Ward Palmer Larsen (born March 14, 1961) is an American thriller novelist known for his David Slaton series and Assassin series. He was the seventh winner of the Florida Book Award. His debut novel, The Perfect Assassin, has been optioned for film by Amber Entertainment.
Larsen was a former United States Air Force fighter pilot and currently serves as an airline captain.  He is also a trained aircraft accident investigator.
